name: Tic-Tac-Toe
description:
This is a classic game of Tic-Tac-Toe with an option to play against a player or against an AI (computer).

Instructions:

To navigate in the menu, type corresponding number. For example, to play against AI (computer) on easy difficulty, first type 11 and press enter, and then type 1 and again, press enter

Choosing which field you want to capture is the same as navigating in the menu.

Features:

* Player vs Player

* Player vs Computer

* Difficulty range - choosing hard difficulty is easy but actually winning is hard. Worry not! You can always choose to play on medium or easy difficulty

* Statistics - always know who is better

* Change of character - you do not have to play as an 'x' or 'o' anymore
